Column1: Behrendorff to Dhoni, 1 run, yorker length at the stumps, squeezes it into the on-side to win the game. Would've been gone with a direct-hit but there wasn't

Behrendorff to Dhoni, SIX, not quite the distance as he had managed on that epic Clint McKay six in 2012 at this very venue, but just like that six, this one will seal the game too. Slower ball angled away from off, Dhoni launches this, absolutely launches this over long-on. Brings up his fifty with that
Stoinis to Dhoni, 1 run, wanted to unleash the long handle on this full ball, but didn't get the elevation he was after. Full on off, tonks it down to long-on. Goes on the bounce to the fielder

Stoinis to Karthik, 3 runs, brings out the paddle-scoop and guides it quite fine. But Behrendorff is still able to slide across to keep it inside the boundary. He won't be able to stop Dhoni's charge for the third though. Dhoni is quite clearly struggling out there. But he powers on..
Stoinis to Dhoni, 1 run, back of a length delivery just outside off, taps it in front of extra cover
Stoinis to Karthik, 1 run, full at the stumps, the bat comes down dead straight from Karthik as he punches to long-on
Stoinis to Karthik, 2 runs, happy to do it with proper cricketing shots. Fuller than a good length outside off, punches it sweetly through extra cover
Stoinis to Dhoni, 1 run, short of length on off, punches it down to long-off. Will Karthik be the one to take the risk?

Behrendorff to Karthik, 2 runs, walks down at Behrendorff and flicks this length ball in between long-on and deep midwicket. Misfield from Maxwell as he charges in for the one-handed pick up. Nine from the over again. India still happy to knock the singles and twos
Behrendorff to Dhoni, 3 runs, short of length on leg stump, off-pace again from Behrendorff but Dhoni is able to work him fine enough that even the third run is on while short fine leg gives chase
Behrendorff to Karthik, 1 run, slower ball that's pitched up outside off, driven through the covers. Only a single again
Behrendorff to Dhoni, 1 run, slower short of length delivery on off, clips it to deep midwicket
Behrendorff to Karthik, 1 run, full toss around off, Karthik biffs it down to long-on
Behrendorff to Dhoni, 1 run, short of length on off, Dhoni with the short-arm pull to deep midwicket
Stoinis to Karthik, 2 runs, good length ball on off, works it wide of long-on and calls two straightaway. The misfield from Shaun Marsh helps his cause further
Stoinis to Karthik, no run, length ball outside off, pushes it to cover
Stoinis to Karthik, FOUR, slower short ball on leg stump which just sits up for Karthik. And his timing has been on point so far. Whacks the pull behind square. Nice and brisk knock from him so far
Stoinis to Karthik, 2 runs, low full toss that Karthik drives through extra cover for a comfortable two
Stoinis to Dhoni, 1 run, full ball outside off, pushes it through the covers
Stoinis to Dhoni, no run, slower ball on off, Dhoni pats it back to Stoinis
J Richardson to Dhoni, 1 run, short of length delivery just outside off, shuffles back and across and tucks it through midwicket
J Richardson to Dhoni, wide, back of a length delivery slipping down the leg-side, Dhoni thought about the leg-glance but then lifted his arms to collect the wide
J Richardson to Karthik, 1 run, nudges it into the on-side for a single

J Richardson to Karthik, FOUR, swivels across to a short ball and finds himself in an excellent position for the pull. He was onto the back foot so quickly. And then the timing on it was just sublime as he dispatched it behind square
J Richardson to Dhoni, 1 run, back of a length on middle and off, clipped behind square
J Richardson to Karthik, 1 run, that's a sweetly timed flick shot from Karthik as he picks it away from middle stump to deep midwicket
J Richardson to Dhoni, leg byes, 1 run, back of a length on leg, deflects off Dhoni's thigh pad down to fine leg
Lyon to Dhoni, 1 run, tossed up on off, knocks it calmly down to long-on
Lyon to Dhoni, 2 runs, slightly short across off from round the wicket, Dhoni hops back and punches it wide of long-off
Lyon to Dhoni, no run, Lyon pulls it back in flight, Dhoni defends down the pitch
Lyon to Dhoni, SIX, Dhoni steps out, and then steps it up. Close enough to the pitch of this off-break, unleashes a fierce swipe over midwicket
Lyon to Dhoni, 2 runs, bad misfield there. Could've been a dot ball. Uses his feet and flicks it to the left of square leg who dived over the ball
Lyon to Dhoni, no run, darted in on leg, back of a length, Dhoni awkwardly tries to paddle it fine but is struck on the thigh pad
J Richardson to Dhoni, 1 run, back of a length on off, walks across and clips it to long leg
J Richardson to Karthik, 1 run, short of length on off, shuffles across and tucks it behind square

J Richardson to Kohli, out Caught by Maxwell!! Kohli has holed out, and suddenly, there's a renewed sense of vigour in Australia as they celebrate. Full ball at the stumps, he nailed the flick shot, but found Maxwell at deep midwicket. Went flat and straight to him. Pressure on India's lower middle-order now, big test coming up. Meanwhile, Kohli gets a standing ovation as he walks off. Kohli c Maxwell b J Richardson 104(112) [4s-5 6s-2]
J Richardson to Dhoni, 1 run, nudges this through the midwicket region
J Richardson to Dhoni, 2 runs, back of a length on off, punches it through extra cover. Another comfortable two with the big square boundary that side
J Richardson to Kohli, 1 run, back of a length on off, clips it through midwicket
Siddle to Dhoni, 2 runs, low full toss on middle and leg, flicks it wide of long leg. Easy two
Siddle to Kohli, 1 run, pitched up at the stumps, chips it on the bounce to long-on
Siddle to Dhoni, 1 run, slower full ball on off, knocks it past Siddle down to long-on

Siddle to Dhoni, 2 runs, now that's excellent running. Don't think any other Indian pair would've pulled it off other than this one. Back of a length just outside off, Dhoni nudges it softly in front of long-on. Such is the understanding that they just look at each other and decide to scamper back while long-on charges in from the deep
Siddle to Dhoni, wide, slower short ball that loops up quite high outside off, Dhoni lets it go expecting a wide and he gets it
Siddle to Kohli, 1 run, low full toss at the stumps, flicks it to deep backward square

Siddle to Kohli, 2 runs, a hundred in a run-chase for Virat Kohli, tell me something new. He walks at Siddle, clips the slower ball through midwicket and races back for two. Really looks determined out there as he pumps his fist and points to someone in the dressing room
J Richardson to Kohli, 1 run, short of length delivery just outside off, pulls it down to long-on. Wasn't completely in control of it
J Richardson to Kohli, no run, back of a length delivery outside off, can't get his dab past backward point
J Richardson to Dhoni, 1 run, back of a length on off, punches it to mid-off for a single
J Richardson to Kohli, 1 run, oh, that flew off the leading edge and nearly carried to third man. Full on middle, wanted to whip it through midwicket but was too early through the shot
J Richardson to Kohli, no run, back of a length delivery just outside off, steers it to point

J Richardson to Dhoni, legbyes, 1 run, back of a length on middle and leg, Dhoni fails to clip it away and it drops off his pad along the pitch. Richardson didn't want to get in the way of a hurtling Dhoni, lest he get bulldozed
Siddle to Kohli, no run, walks down to a ball that's on a back of a length on off, wanted to work it through the on-side but gets a thick outside edge to short third man
Siddle to Dhoni, 1 run, back of a length delivery outside off, pokes it wide of cover
Siddle to Dhoni, wide, another bouncer that flies over the batsman's head. Dhoni didn't even have to bend
Siddle to Kohli, 1 run, slower short ball outside off, Kohli slaps it to deep point
Siddle to Kohli, wide, too high with this bouncer, sails over Kohli's head
Siddle to Dhoni, 1 run, pulls it to deep backward square leg, all along the ground this time

Siddle to Dhoni, 2 runs, falls just short of Behrendorff at fine leg. Dhoni was outsmarted by Siddle here. He stepped out, only to find the ball banged in short and rushing him on the pull. Hits him high on the bat and spoons up in front of fine leg. Valiant effort from the tall quick to get to it, can't do so
Siddle to Kohli, 1 run, walks at Siddle and whips this length ball to deep midwicket

Stoinis to Dhoni, no run, punched back sweetly to Stoinis who has a shy at the striker's end, but Dhoni had got back after wandering out for a bit. Stoinis has a big smile on his face, Dhoni remains stone-faced
Stoinis to Dhoni, no run, happy to bend underneath the bouncer, the first one of the over
Stoinis to Dhoni, no run, back of a length delivery just outside off, punches it to mid-off
Stoinis to Kohli, 1 run, back of a length delivery just outside off, dabs it down to third man
Stoinis to Kohli, no run, stops on Kohli as he tries to punch through cover, gets it off the inside half to mid-on instead
Stoinis to Kohli, no run, back of a length on off, Kohli walks at it and turns it to midwicket
J Richardson to Dhoni, 2 runs, back of a length on off, clips it backward of square and hurries back for the second run
J Richardson to Dhoni, no run, banged in short by Richardson, Dhoni bobs his head underneath it. Given as the second bouncer for the over
J Richardson to Dhoni, no run, full at the stumps, clipped to midwicket
J Richardson to Kohli, 1 run, short ball above the shoulders, pulls it hard to deep square leg
J Richardson to Kohli, 2 runs, just gets a hand on it with a dive, else it would've raced away. Length ball slanted in, Kohli clipped it wide of mid-on where Khawaja made the save
J Richardson to Dhoni, 1 run, full ball on off stump, nudges it in front of mid-on for a quick single
Stoinis to Kohli, FOUR, width on offer and Kohli pounces on it! Both feet up in the air and he flays it behind point with superb timing. Into the 90s now
Stoinis to Kohli, no run, mild appeal for leg before but Kohli was too far down the pitch. Wanted to flick this through mid-wicket, but was on the move and was hit high on the pad. No dice!
Stoinis to Dhoni, 1 run, punches it to deep cover
Stoinis to Kohli, 1 run, shuffles forward and fetches the pull from outside off to deep mid-wicket
Stoinis to Kohli, no run, pitched up outside off, Kohli drives square and can't get it past backward point
Stoinis to Kohli, no run, good length on off, Kohli hops inside the crease and punches to short cover
Lyon to Kohli, 1 run, flat on leg stump, punched wide of mid-wicket and Kohli will retain strike
Lyon to Kohli, no run, flicked off the pads to short fine
Lyon to Kohli, 2 runs, flicks this away in the gap at mid-wicket and they steal another couple of runs
Lyon to Kohli, 2 runs, 200 up for India. Kohli slammed this through cover and it needed some brilliance from Handscomb to prevent the boundary
Lyon to Kohli, no run, quicker outside off, chopped out to point
Lyon to Kohli, SIX, advances and lofts Nathan Lyon into the sightscreen. It was full and straight and Kohli had his plans ready, superb timing too!
Stoinis to Dhoni, 2 runs, punches firmly past the diving left hand of short cover and gets back for the second
Stoinis to Dhoni, no run, fuller and wider of off, Dhoni opens the face and drives to cover-point
Stoinis to Kohli, 1 run, lets the ball leap up onto the willow, taps with soft hands into the leg-side and pinches a quick single
Stoinis to Kohli, no run, drops this into the off-side and thinks of a quick single, wasn't to be
Stoinis to Kohli, no run, slower ball on leg stump, Kohli misses the flick and is pinged high on the pad. Sliding down...
Stoinis to Kohli, leg byes, 2 runs, looks to tickle fine, but it goes off the thigh pad to the right of short fine
Lyon to Dhoni, no run, looks to force a punch and mistimes it to short cover
Lyon to Dhoni, no run, advances and drives this back to the bowler
Lyon to Kohli, 1 run, tucked away behind square on the leg-side

Lyon to Kohli, FOUR, Kohli knows there's width on this and he smartly opened the face to send an educated edge fine past the keeper, Siddle gives chase from short third but Lyon's pace on the delivery took care of the rest
Lyon to Dhoni, 1 run, stays side-on and punches a single to deep cover
Lyon to Kohli, 1 run, full on the stumps, Kohli biffs the drive to long-on
Behrendorff to Kohli, 1 run, powered away to deep cover and Kohli will keep the strike

Behrendorff to Kohli, SIX, that is Virat Kohli T20 mode on! Doesn't generally get into that zone, but once he gets there its diffcult to unsettle him. Second guesses Behrendorff and belts this length ball from the crease over long-on. Sheer timing and power
Behrendorff to Kohli, no run, good length on middle and leg, nudged into the leg-side

Behrendorff to Kohli, FOUR, can't be erring to Kohli by that margin. Short and wide, Kohli's quick to transfer the weight on the back foot and he spanks it in the gap wide of extra cover. No stopping that
Behrendorff to Kohli, 2 runs, gets the perfect length to cream a punch through extra cover, gets the second in a canter
Behrendorff to Dhoni, 1 run, shuffles outside his off-stump and clips the fullish delivery to the right of deep square
Maxwell to Dhoni, 1 run, opens the face and wrists the drive into the off-side for an easy single
Maxwell to Dhoni, no run, full on off, pushed back to the bowler
Maxwell to Dhoni, no run, darted in on leg stump, Dhoni flicks but can't get it past square leg
Maxwell to Dhoni, no run, seeks to flick and chips a soft leading edge in front of mid-wicket
Maxwell to Dhoni, no run, swivels on the short ball and drags the pull straight to Finch at square leg
Maxwell to Dhoni, no run, tossed up on the stumps, Dhoni strides forward and blocks to mid-wicket
Behrendorff to Dhoni, 1 run, hops inside the crease and tucks this off the ribcage towards fine leg
Behrendorff to Dhoni, no run, looks to defend and inside-edges the length delivery back onto pad
Behrendorff to Dhoni, no run, back of a length shaping in towards off, tapped back to the bowler
Behrendorff to Dhoni, 2 runs, brilliant late cut from MS and he gets it in the gap behind point, Richardson pulls off a dive near the ropes and keeps it down to two
Behrendorff to Kohli, 1 run, back of a length wide of off-stump, Kohli uses the width to glide a single to third man
Behrendorff to Kohli, no run, short and skids across off, Kohli chips forward and drops it dead near his feet
Maxwell to Kohli, 1 run, is quick to rock back and pull the quicker delivery to deep mid-wicket
Maxwell to Kohli, no run, drifts in with the arm, Kohli goes back and tucks to mid-wicket

Maxwell to Rayudu, out Caught by Stoinis!! Rayudu's scratchy innings coes to an end. Was getting restless with a lot of mistimed shots and he had to try something out of the box; decides to use his feet and swipes over mid-wicket, hasn't gotten anywhere near the middle of the bat and Stoinis takes a dolly of a catch running in from deep mid-wicket. Rayudu c Stoinis b Maxwell 24(36) [4s-2]
Maxwell to Kohli, 1 run, full on the stumps, Kohli whip-drives wide of long-on
Maxwell to Kohli, 2 runs, tucked away off the pads to fine leg

Maxwell to Kohli, 2 runs, deft from VK! Waits deep inside the crease and plays the late cut at the last possible instant to buy a couple of runs fine of third man. 49th ODI fifty for the Indian skipper. Zero celebrations...
J Richardson to Kohli, 1 run, keeps the strike with a steer down to third man
J Richardson to Rayudu, 1 run, slower ball outside off, Rayudu opens the face and guides late to the left of backward point

J Richardson to Rayudu, 2 runs, shimmies down the track and goes for the flat-bat loft, he knew mid-off was in and hence took the risk. Not well timed, but good enough to get it over the backtracking fielder
J Richardson to Rayudu, no run, no room on this, Rayudu sits back and punches it back to the bowler
J Richardson to Rayudu, 2 runs, jumps down the track, loses his shape trying to carve one over cover, manages to get it over the infield and complete an easy two
J Richardson to Rayudu, no run, length delivery closing in on off, Rayudu gets across and dinks it back to the bowler
Maxwell to Kohli, no run, gets enticed by the line (down leg) and attempts a flashy sweep, the ball dips much later and pings Kohli on the forearm
Maxwell to Rayudu, 1 run, skiddy short delivery on leg-stump, Rayudu swivels and pulls to deep square
Maxwell to Rayudu, no run, slider outside off, Rayudu goes hard on the cut and stabs it into the off-side
Maxwell to Kohli, 1 run, quicker delivery outside off, Kohli pulls it past the diving right hand of Finch at short mid-wicket
Maxwell to Rayudu, 1 run, brooms the full delivery from off to deep backward square

Maxwell to Kohli, 1 run, roundarm full delivery on off, Kohli whips to deep mid-wicket and calls for two straightaway. Just as Rayudu was about to storm in, Kohli puts his hand up and decides against the risky second
J Richardson to Kohli, 1 run, 140ks plenty of width on this, Kohli stands tall and powers it away through cover for a single
J Richardson to Kohli, no run, hits the good length and offers some width outside off, Kohli middles the punch-drive but can't get it past the cover fielder
J Richardson to Kohli, no run, back of a length just outside off, bunted back to the bowler
J Richardson to Rayudu, 1 run, steps down the track and goes through with the pull on the move, lands a few yards away from the fielder at deep backward square
J Richardson to Kohli, 1 run, waits on the back foot and steers the back of a length delivery to third man
J Richardson to Kohli, no run, absolutely nailed the straight drive, unfortunately for Kohli and India it went too straight and smacked the stumps at the non-striker's end
Maxwell to Rayudu, no run, walks down the pitch and forces a punch to cover
Maxwell to Kohli, 1 run, slower and spinning in
Maxwell to Kohli, no run, full on leg-stump, driven back to the bowler
Maxwell to Rayudu, 1 run, Rayudu gets down on one knee and goes for the slog sweep, shouts of catch it but it lands well short of deep mid-wicket
Maxwell to Kohli, 1 run, floated up on the stumps, clipped away past the diving right hand of square leg
Maxwell to Kohli, 2 runs, Kohli wants to take on Maxwell. Shows intent strightaway! Rocks back and spanks this flatter delivery through extra cover, Handscomb puts in a dive once again in the deep
Siddle to Kohli, 1 run, shortish outside off, crunched away to sweeper cover
Siddle to Kohli, 2 runs, half-volley at the stumps, a stylish flick from Kohli through mid-wicket. Handscomb in the deep does a good job, pulling it back and saves a couple of runs for his team
Siddle to Rayudu, 1 run, manufactures room, takes a stride forward and runs it down to third man
Siddle to Rayudu, no run, length delivery, keeping it closer to off. Rayudu dabs it with soft hands to point
Siddle to Kohli, 1 run, shorter outside off, guided to third man
Siddle to Kohli, no run, fuller length, too straight. Clipped to mid-wicket
Lyon to Kohli, 1 run, slowish on middle, tickled away to fine leg
Lyon to Rayudu, 1 run, bunted to long-on
Lyon to Kohli, 1 run, wristed to mid-wicket
Lyon to Rayudu, 2 wides, slipping down leg, Lyon's been penalised. Carey can't gather it cleanly as well, so they will pinch an extra
Lyon to Kohli, 1 run, floated up outside off, Kohli leans into a drive to sweeper cover, they won't risk the second
Lyon to Kohli, no run, Lyon drops it short, Kohli camps back and pulls it to square leg
Lyon to Kohli, no run, 88.9kph, accurate at the stumps. Turned away to backward square leg
Stoinis to Rayudu, no run, pitched fuller on off, Rayudu greets it with a straight-batted drive back to the bowler
Stoinis to Rayudu, 2 runs, carved uppishly over point, threw his bat on this full ball outside off and just out of reach of Maxi
Stoinis to Rayudu, 2 runs, miscue from Rayudu. Gets cramped on the pull, gets it high on the bat and skews it over mid-on
Stoinis to Rayudu, no run, Rayudu opens his stance and punches it to extra cover
Stoinis to Kohli, 1 run, 131.6kph, length outside off. Kohli hops back and chops it to third man
Stoinis to Kohli, no run, whangs it short, Kohli was getting down the pitch, looking for the pull. On seeing the steepy bounce, withdraws from the shot
Siddle to Rayudu, no run, shorter outside off, sliced to point
Siddle to Rayudu, no run, cutting back into the right-hander, Rayudu gets right behind the line on this occasion to blunt it

Siddle to Rayudu, FOUR, Rayudu is looking nervy out there. Siddle plants it in the corridor outside off and Rayudu goes for the drive with hard hands. No feet, just hands following the ball and outside edge flies through the invisible first slip region
Siddle to Rayudu, no run, jittery from Rayudu. Wobbling just outside off, held its line and Rayudu groped it away from his body. Just missed the edge
Siddle to Kohli, 1 run, corrects his line and lasers it just outside off, glided away to third man
Siddle to Kohli, 2 runs, disdain! Half-volley on the stumps, whipped off the pads towards deep mid-wicket
Stoinis to Kohli, 1 run, dipping slower ball, driven to sweeper cover
Stoinis to Rayudu, 1 run, dug in short, pulled away to deep square leg
Stoinis to Rayudu, no run, slight nip back in just outside off, Rayudu chops it from the crease and gets an inside edge which falls periliously close to the stumps
Stoinis to Rayudu, no run,
Stoinis to Rayudu, no run, back of a length outside off, Rayudu stays back and taps it to point
Stoinis to Rayudu, no run, presses forward and stabs it to mid-off.
Stoinis to Kohli, 1 run, pushed to cover
Lyon to Kohli, 1 run, Kohli retains the strike with a whip round the corner
Lyon to Rayudu, leg byes, 1 run, under-cutter, Rayudu sits low to sweep and gets it off the pad
Lyon to Rayudu, no run, shade quicker from Lyon, flicked to mid-wicket
Lyon to Kohli, 1 run, slower, enough time for Kohli to nurdle it to backward square leg
Lyon to Kohli, no run, drifting with the arm outside off, Kohli jumps back and smothers
Lyon to Kohli, no run, flighted on middle, blocked

Stoinis to Rayudu, FOUR, Rayudu opens his account with a boundary. Seemed like the cutter from Stoinis, Rayudu read it early. Opening the bat face intentionally and guiding it in the pocket between the keeper and the lone slip. Third man fielder was squarer and he had no chance
Stoinis to Rayudu, no run, 131kph, length delivery shaping back in around off. Rayudu defends it cautiously off the back foot
Stoinis to Rayudu, no run, cross-seamer from Stoinis, outside off. Rayudu leaves it alone
Stoinis to Rayudu, no run, gets on top of the bounce of this back of a length delivery and punches it to point
Stoinis to Kohli, 1 run, fuller length outside off, driven after opening the bat face to sweeper cover
Stoinis to Kohli, no run, hurls it outside off, pushed defensively into the off-side.
Lyon to Rayudu, no run, slanted with the arm, smothered off the back foot
Lyon to Rayudu, no run, runs down the track, Lyon shortens his length and forces Rayudu to defend it hurriedly
Lyon to Rayudu, no run, tossed up on leg, Rayudu crouches low and works it to mid-wicket
Lyon to Kohli, 1 run, flatter from Lyon, Kohli punches it down to long-on
Lyon to Kohli, no run, camps back and blocks it stoutly
Lyon to Kohli, no run, quicker on middle and leg, tucked to square leg
Stoinis to Kohli, 1 run, fuller length and straightens a bit, Kohli gropes and squirts it off the outer half behind point

Stoinis to Rohit, out Caught by Handscomb!! This is the wicket that Australia were looking for and Stoinis nets the big fish. The centurion from the previous game has been sent back to the hut. Just when it looked like Rohit was settling into his groove, he's mistimed a pull and holes out to Handscomb at deep mid-wicket. His favourite shot has led to his downfall, 99 out of 100 times he would've connected it. Rohit c Handscomb b Stoinis 43(52) [4s-2 6s-2]
Stoinis to Kohli, 1 run, silky drive from Kohli after getting onto the front foot to sweeper cover
Stoinis to Rohit, 1 run, 129.1kph, good length on off. Sharma fetches it from there and helps it away to fine leg. 100 up for India which draws a round of applause from the Indian fans
Stoinis to Rohit, no run, fullish outside off, Sharma gets forward and defends
Stoinis to Rohit, 2 runs, pitched up outside off, Sharma creams it through extra cover and picks up a brace
Lyon to Rohit, 1 run, tad quicker from Lyon, shortens his length. Tickled to square leg

Lyon to Rohit, SIX, "All hands from Rohit Sharma," says Michael Clarke on air. Sharma's been kept quiet for a while, he decides to break free and takes on Lyon. Loads up, gets under the flighted delivery and clubs it powerfully over cow corner
Lyon to Kohli, 1 run, flatter trajectory, on middle and leg. Nudged away to deep mid-wicket
Lyon to Rohit, 1 run, drifter outside off, draws Sharma forward. Tap-and-run single in front of point
Lyon to Rohit, no run, stable push from the crease to point
Lyon to Kohli, 1 run, loopy delivery outside off, ample time for Kohli to get onto the back foot and dab it to short third man
Siddle to Kohli, 1 run, length delivery, in the channel. Kohli waits back and dinks it to third man
Siddle to Rohit, 1 run, wafts it around off, guided to third man

Siddle to Rohit, 2 runs, Sharma takes it in front of the stumps and whips it airly towards mid-wicket, Marsh gets low and stretches his left hand. The ball bounces and hits his fingertips to run away. Mid-on chases and cuts it off
Siddle to Kohli, 1 run, steered away to sweeper cover
Siddle to Kohli, no run, props forward to a full ball outside off, blocked into the off-side
Siddle to Kohli, no run, curving in with the angle, Kohli gets inside the line and blunts it with a straight bat

Lyon to Rohit, no run, confusion again between Sharma and Kohli, the former has been sent back and he dives in his crease to make his ground. Tucked to Maxi at mid-wicket, who moves across quickly to collect the ball and releases the throw to the keeper, Sharma was looking for a single but sent back in time by his skipper
Lyon to Kohli, 1 run, plays with the spin through mid-wicket
Lyon to Kohli, no run, crouches low and gets onto the front foot, flicks it down the ground. But mid-wicket fielder swoops down onto the ball
Lyon to Kohli, no run, jumps back, rolls his wrists and works it to mid-wicket
Lyon to Rohit, 1 run, slower outside off, flowy punch through cover
Lyon to Kohli, 1 run, uses the depth of the crease and knocks it down to long-on

Siddle to Kohli, 1 run, dabbed towards backward point, there's some hesitation in the running. You'd expect that when these two are out in the middle. Bit of yes-no situation as both of them are ball-watching, eventually they scamper through for a single

Siddle to Kohli, FOUR, shot of the innings. Kohli special. Pitched up, too straight and Kohli brings out the full-faced bat drive. Showing the bat-maker's name and nailing it past mid-on. Class written all over it
Siddle to Rohit, 1 run, allows for the ball to arrive and guides it using the bowler's pace to third man
Siddle to Rohit, no run, stays in his crease and pushes it to extra cover

Siddle to Rohit, SIX, Sharma targets the smaller side of the ground and he's made that look so easy. Short, you don't want to be bowling that length to Sharma and Siddle learns. Nonchalant pull off the front foot and he sends it into the stands over deep mid-wicket
Siddle to Kohli, 1 run, fuller and on off, Kohli twirls his wrists and places it wide of mid-on, Khawaja puts in the dive and stops it
Lyon to Rohit, 2 runs, touch full and straight outside off, Rohit is quick to rock back as he chops it away to square third man to end the over with a couple of runs
Lyon to Rohit, no run, tossed up delivery around off and Rohit guides it off his front foot, back to the bowler...
Lyon to Kohli, 1 run, back and across as he nurdles the shortish offbreak to the fielder at fine leg
Lyon to Kohli, no run, nudges this one late but straight to the fielder at mid-wicket
Lyon to Rohit, 1 run, goes deep inside his crease and maneuvers it past the fielder at square leg
Lyon to Rohit, no run, tad short around middle and leg, Rohit nudges it into the leg side
J Richardson to Kohli, no run, tad full around off and it's been driven to mid-off handsomely

J Richardson to Kohli, FOUR, brilliant last minute adjustment by Kohli. He initially wanted to play this off the front foot but transfers his weight on to the back foot as Richardson bowls it short. Connects his back foot punch to perfection and finds the gap at cover too. First of many?
J Richardson to Kohli, no run, outside off, skidding along the deck this length delivery, Kohli keeps his head steady and defends it

J Richardson to Kohli, no run, in the channel outside off, a length ball and it's been stabbed to backward point. Kohli being watchful against Jhye as he was the one who got the Indian skipper the other day
J Richardson to Kohli, no run, tad short around off, holds its line and Kohli defends it solidly off his back foot
J Richardson to Rohit, 1 run, steers it past backward point and ambles across for a single
Lyon to Kohli, no run, goes back in his crease and whips the short ball to the fielder at short mid-wicket
Lyon to Rohit, 1 run, treks back and punches the short ball into the gap at covers for a single
Lyon to Rohit, no run, nudges this one to the left of the keeper who is swift to move back and save the single
Lyon to Kohli, 1 run, comes on his front foot and eases the loopy delivery to long-on
Lyon to Rohit, 1 run, flighted on middle and leg, Rohit flicks it to wide long-on
Lyon to Kohli, 1 run, short on leg and it's been clipped away to deep backward square leg

Behrendorff to Rohit, no run, 130.9kph, shaping away from the batsman in the corridor of uncertainty, Rohit goes for a drive with lack of footwork and gets beaten on his outside edge. Excellent over by Behrendorff as he bowls five consecutive dots on the trot
Behrendorff to Rohit, no run, solid in defence as Rohit keeps a steady head and knocks the length ball to extra cover
Behrendorff to Rohit, no run, on a length around off and Rohit dabs it back to the bowler
Behrendorff to Rohit, no run, another shortish delivery, seaming into the batsman, Rohit looks to nudge this one to the leg side but gets hit on the thigh yet again
Behrendorff to Rohit, no run, seaming away from the batsman around off, tad more carry than usual and Rohit gets hit on the back pad as he looks to play across the line
Behrendorff to Rohit, 2 runs, rides the bounce and punches the back of a length delivery through the gap at covers for a brace
Siddle to Kohli, no run, takes a step down and flicks this one to mid-on
Siddle to Rohit, 1 run, drills the overpitched delivery to mid-on and takes a single

Siddle to Kohli, 1 run, 139.9ks, that was very close to an lbw call. Speared into the batsman on a length and Kohli somehow manages to get an inside edge on to his flick. Had he missed it, this could have been flush on the pads
Siddle to Kohli, no run, very wide outside off, jagging away from the batsman to an extent and Kohli wisely leaves it alone
Siddle to Rohit, 1 run, skiddy back of a length delivery outside off, Rohit plays it late as he steers it down to third man
Siddle to Rohit, no run, flicks this one to the fielder at short mid-wicket, does Rohit
Behrendorff to Rohit, 1 run, glides the back of a length delivery down to third man for a single
Behrendorff to Rohit, no run, back of a length around leg, Rohit tries to play this one into the leg side and gets struck on the pads

Behrendorff to Dhawan, out Caught by Khawaja!! Dhawan's entertaining knock comes to an end! Was playing so well until now, and probably gets carried away. Looks to take on Behrendorff and miscues this one straight to mid-off where Khawaja settles under the skier and takes it comfortably. Dhawan c Khawaja b Behrendorff 32(28) [4s-5]

Behrendorff to Dhawan, FOUR, how good was that shot? Class. This was a back of a length delivery outside off and Dhawan was on his front foot as he played it on the up. Punches it aerially and clears the infield at covers, four runs!
Behrendorff to Rohit, 1 run, tries to nudge the length ball to the leg side, ends up getting an inside edge on to his pads
Behrendorff to Dhawan, 1 run, works the length ball to the fielder at short fine leg and takes a single, does Dhawan
Siddle to Dhawan, 1 run, full in length and outside outside off, Dhawan reaches out for it and creams it to sweeper cover

Siddle to Dhawan, FOUR, India are making sure to get at least one boundary in every over. When you get deliveries like these, it only gets easier. A tad short on leg and Dhawan drags it past the fielder at short fine leg to add four more to his account and to India's total
Siddle to Dhawan, 2 runs, touch full outside off and Dhawan drives it through the gap at cover for two runs
Siddle to Dhawan, no run, walks down the wicket and punches the back of a length ball to the fielder at point
Siddle to Dhawan, no run, back of a length and seaming away from the batsman outside off, Dhawan looks to punch off his back foot, doesn't time it well

Siddle to Dhawan, no run, slightly full in the channel outside off, Dhawan brings his bat down in time and drives it to the fielder at cover-point. He's looking in good touch today, is Dhawan. Timing 'em sweetly
J Richardson to Rohit, no run, in the channel outside off, tad short and it's been left alone
J Richardson to Dhawan, 1 run, chops the short of a length ball to third man and gets a single
J Richardson to Dhawan, wide, down the leg side, Dhawan attempted flick doesn't connect

J Richardson to Dhawan, no run, that was a close call! Fired into the batsman on a length and Dhawan was a touch late to bring his bat down. The impact was in front of off and the Australian's didn't even go up in an appeal, as they thought there was bat involved. Well, the HawkEye says it was going over the stumps as well
J Richardson to Dhawan, no run, excellent stop by Lyon at cover. Saves a boundary with his dive. Was a fraction short outside off and Dhawan punched it firmly, only to be denied a boundary by Gary

J Richardson to Dhawan, FOUR, this was in the air, but well past Maxwell at point. Touch full and wide outside off, Dhawan reaches out for it and slices it past the diving fielder at point. Just the kind of start India needed in this chase
J Richardson to Rohit, 1 run, tad short on middle and leg, Rohit tucks it into the leg side

Behrendorff to Dhawan, 2 runs, channeled around middle and off, Dhawan clips it down to long leg and by the time the throw comes in from the deep, the southpaw manages to come back for two. His bat got stuck into the turf as he tried to drag his bat in but the keeper couldn't deflect it on to the stumps, hence there's no trouble for the batsman
Behrendorff to Dhawan, no run, another fullish delivery outside off and Dhawan squeezes it in front of cover, Lyon stops it this time around

Behrendorff to Dhawan, FOUR, looks a completely different batsman in colored clothing, does Dhawan. This was a touch full outside off, Dhawan goes down on his knee and creams it past the fielder at cover. There was a dive put by Lyon, but there was no chance stopping this
Behrendorff to Dhawan, 2 runs, heaves the length delivery through mid-wicket for a brace
Behrendorff to Dhawan, no run, tries to punch this length ball on the up and ends up getting an inside edge on to his pads
Behrendorff to Dhawan, leg byes, FOUR, short ball on leg and Dhawan doesn't have to do much. The ball clips his thigh pad and races away to the fine leg fence
J Richardson to Rohit, no run, ends the over with a dot ball. Corrects his line and bowls it outside off, gets it to shape away too and Rohit doesn't bother to play at it
J Richardson to Rohit, no run, tad short around off, seaming away from the batsman and Rohit defends it off his back foot
J Richardson to Dhawan, 1 run, a good length delivery around middle and leg, Dhawan eyes mid-wicket and clips it through the gap

J Richardson to Dhawan, no run, that's typical Dhawan! Trying to go after everything. This was angled away from him and Shikhar has a go at it, swings at the ball and is beaten all ends up, could've nicked the inside edge
J Richardson to Dhawan, FOUR, first one of the match for Dhawan. This was on the pads and Dhawan clips it through square leg, beats two fielders. One inside the circle, the other one near the fence
J Richardson to Dhawan, no run, in the channel outside off and it's been driven towards cover, didn't time that well
Behrendorff to Rohit, no run, outside off, back of a length, Rohit feels for it and almost nicks it behind
Behrendorff to Rohit, no run, back of a length, kicks off the deck and deviates away, Rohit awkdwardly fends at it and somehow manages to keep it on the ground

Behrendorff to Dhawan, 1 run, superb save by Jhye Richardson at third man. Saves three for his team. Dhawan had sliced the widish delivery over backward point and the pacer sprints across in the deep to stop the ball with a fine effort. Dhawan thought this was a boundary, hence he was a bit casual with his running. Not more than a single...

Behrendorff to Dhawan, no run, this is how he was dismissed in the previous match. Looking to play across the line. A similar delivery, just that the length was a tad short, Dhawan tries to flick across the line and gets an inside edge on to his pads
Behrendorff to Dhawan, no run, 133.5kph, touch full in length and Dhawan drives it gently to mid-on
Behrendorff to Dhawan, no run, outside off, hint of away swing and Dhawan plays inside the line, letting the keeper do the rest
J Richardson to Rohit, no run, good line and length, shaping away from the batsman outside off and Rohit lets it through to the keeper

J Richardson to Rohit, FOUR, great timing! Tad short and curving away from the batsman outside off, Rohit opens his bat face late and guides it past the fielder at point. Third man tries his best to stop the ball with a sprint but comes second
J Richardson to Rohit, no run, down the leg side, Rohit tries a glance but the ball clips his pads on its way to the keeper
J Richardson to Rohit, FOUR, here's the patent Rohit Sharma pull! On his front foot and drags the length delivery through the gap at mid-wicket. Effortless
J Richardson to Rohit, no run, shaping away from the batsman on a good length, Rohit shuffles across the off-stump and dabs it to point
J Richardson to Dhawan, 1 run, on the pads and Dhawan clips it to wide mid-on for his first run of the series
Behrendorff to Rohit, no run, Behrendorff starts off with a maiden over! Keeps this one outside off, on a good length and Rohit decides to leave it alone
Behrendorff to Rohit, no run, keeps this full and straight outside off, Rohit takes a forward stride and drives it to mid-off
Behrendorff to Rohit, no run, in the channel outside off, a good length delivery that's been left alone by Rohit
Behrendorff to Rohit, no run, on his front foot to drive the length delivery to the fielder at mid-on
Behrendorff to Rohit, no run, quicker delivery on leg, hint of inswing and Rohit gets an inside edge as he looks to play this one into the leg side
Behrendorff to Rohit, no run, swinging the ball back into the batsman around middle and leg, Rohit flicks it to the fielder at short mid-wicket
